description:
Brain Memory 2 is based on simple memory game principles. It effectively helps improve focus and memory for everyone.


ADORABLE ILLUSTRATIONS
Thanks to colorful pictures, itâ€™s easier to remember where each card is located. However, be cautious as some cards may differ in the held object or the pose the character assumes. Pay attention to the smallest details as it is key to success.


CUSTOMIZE YOUR CARDS
To train effectively, the player can choose their preferred difficulty level and customize the appearance of the card covers. This allows the mind to focus on the appropriate number of cards and colors on the board.


KEY FEATURES:
- 18 levels of difficulty
- Colorful illustrations on cards
- 10 colors of covers
- Relaxing music
name: Brain Memory 2
